Name: FullyBroken - Old Dawn
About the game: Card-battler meets an RPG, with a branching narrative and hours of gameplay Choose your character Choose your battling strategy and style with tons of options Choices Matter Cast of interesting characters Survive in a harsh world The future of Mir, is in your hands. Background: You are one of the test subjects, and therefore one of the few survivors, of an underground lab sponsored by the government to create super-soldiers in the upcoming global war. Now decades later, the Great War and the ensuing civil wars left the country decimate. You are part of The Resurgence, one of the eight factions trying to conquer or unite Mir. Set in the fictional country of Mir, inspired by the early 20th century, which despite its many advancements this time period brought, the people will always remember it by the wars. Your choices, your consequences.
